creator: todd@cfsilence.com
text:
Created attachment 22105
zip containing several ppt test files

I'm having problems with rendering some PPT templates as images.  The images do not correctly render - sometimes they are completely black, other times the rendering is close but the quality is not that great.  Attached is a ZIP containing a few templates that I have tested.  Can you advise?  Thanks!

Sorry I didn't see this thread before I posted this bug:

http://mail-archives.apache.org/mod_mbox/poi-user/200806.mbox/%3C484BD640.9050206@dinom.ru%3E

Are you planning on integrating WMF support in 3.1 final?  Your instructions are very clear in that post, but I'm not a Java user so I'm not sure I can follow along with your fix that you posted (I'm using HSLF in ColdFusion).  I will try your fix tonight, but it would be really nice to have this baked in to HSLF (if that is possible).
creator: todd@cfsilence.com

text:
Not in 3.1-final, it's too late to for that (:.

I do plan to support WMF in 3.2 as well as support gradient fills and texture patterns.

I marked this bug as WORKFORME, your samples seem to be good tests. 

Yegor
creator: yegor@dinom.ru

text: If you need anything else feel free to ping me off list.
creator: todd@cfsilence.com
